statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_scores;
SELECT vendor_name, price_score FROM vendor_scores WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score FROM vendor_scores WHERE price_score > 3;
SELECT vendor_name, customer_service_score FROM vendor_scores ORDER BY reliability_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score, customer_service_score FROM vendor_scores WHERE price_score > 2 ORDER BY price_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scores WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, price_score FROM vendor_scores WHERE reliability_score > 4 ORDER BY customer_service_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score, customer_service_score FROM vendor_scores WHERE price_score < 3 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scores WHERE price_score >= 4 AND reliability_score < 2;
SELECT vendor_name, customer_service_score FROM vendor_scores WHERE price_score BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY reliability_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, price_score FROM suppliers WHERE reliability_score > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, reliability_score, customer_service_score FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY supplier_id, price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, price_score, reliability_score FROM suppliers WHERE price_score > 7 ORDER BY reliability_score DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50 AND availability = true ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, price_score, customer_service_score FROM suppliers WHERE customer_service_score < 5 AND price_score > 5 ORDER BY customer_service_score DESC, price_score ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE availability = false
SELECT supplier_name, price_score, reliability_score, customer_service_score FROM suppliers WHERE reliability_score >= 8 AND customer_service_score >= 7 ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_name, price_score, reliability_score, customer_service_score FROM vendors WHERE price_score > 4.5
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT vendor_name, price_rating, date_rated FROM vendors INNER JOIN vendor_ratings ON vendors.vendor_id = vendor_ratings.vendor_id
SELECT * FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_name, price_score FROM vendors WHERE price_score > 4.5 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score FROM vendors WHERE reliability_score < 3.0 ORDER BY reliability_score ASC
SELECT vendor_name, customer_service_score FROM vendors WHERE customer_service_score BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC

SELECT v.vendor_name, vr.price_rating, vr.reliability_rating FROM vendors v INNER JOIN vendor_ratings vr ON v.vendor_id = vr.vendor_id WHERE vr.price_rating > 3 AND vr.reliability_rating > 3 ORDER BY v.vendor_name
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, price_score, reliability_score FROM vendors WHERE price_score > 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, customer_service_score FROM vendors WHERE reliability_score < 4;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC, price_score DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, price_score, reliability_score FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(rating_id) as avg_rating FROM vendors JOIN ratings ON vendors.vendor_id = ratings.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_purchases, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity, AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE price_score > 80;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, rating FROM products INNER JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, price_score, reliability_score FROM suppliers ORDER BY reliability_score DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, availability FROM products WHERE price < 100;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE total_price > 500;
SELECT reviews.customer_name, reviews.rating, products.product_name FROM reviews JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id;
